arts.ttl: ‘I love this team’ – Luis Enrique reveals his appreciation for Hansi Flick’s Barcelona
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain head coach Luis Enrique has moved to reveal his appreciation for the ongoing excellence of La Liga heavyweights Barcelona. This of course comes ahead of the upcoming showdown…

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG: Three talking points ahead of Champions League clash
arts.sum: FC Barcelona welcome Paris Saint-Germain to the Lluis Companys Olympic Stadium tonight for a blockbuster Champions League clash. While this is not a knockout tie, the stakes feel high given how dominant both sides have been over the past year. Last season, Barcelona reached the semi-finals before falling to Inter Milan in dramatic fashion. PSG […] The post Barcelona vs PSG: Three talking points ahead of Champions League clash appeared first on Sempre Barca.

arts.ttl: Barcelona phenom raring to go ahead of PSG clash -‘I’m back, and the mission is also back’
arts.sum: As Barcelona gear up for their high-stakes UEFA Champions League clash against Paris Saint-Germain, teenage sensation Lamine Yamal has made it clear that he feels no pressure going into one of the biggest games of the season. The young forward recently returned to action after battling discomfort, an issue that became worse during the demanding […] The post Barcelona phenom raring to go ahead of PSG clash -‘I’m back, and the mission is also back’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Possible Barcelona lineup against PSG with Lamine Yamal back in action
arts.sum: With Lamine set to start for Barça, Ferran Torres or Marcus Rashford are candidates to perform from the off with Robert Lewandowski likely to spearhead the attack for the current LaLiga leaders. After almost a month out of action, the teenager participated in more than thirty minutes of the matchday seven LaLiga game against Real Sociedad and showed plenty of flair which suggests that his back and groin problems are things in the past.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Excellent news for Paris!
arts.sum: This Wednesday, second-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face 12th-placed FC Barcelona at the Montjuïc Stadium in Matchday 2 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). A few hours before kick-off, RMC Sport is reporting positive news for Paris. More specifically, regarding Vitinha (25-year-old midfielder). “Last night, optimism was rife among Parisians regarding Vitinha’s […]

arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona squad list to face PSG – key player returns
arts.sum: FC Barcelona have confirmed their squad list for the highly anticipated Champions League clash against Paris Saint-Germain on matchday two of the group stage. The biggest news is the return of Alejandro Balde, who has been sidelined since early September with a muscle injury. The left-back, one of the brightest products of La Masia, suffered […] The post Official: Barcelona squad list to face PSG – key player returns appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – The probable line-up with a nasty surprise for Paris?
arts.sum: On the eve of the clash against FC Barcelona, Paris Saint-Germain is expected to field a rejuvenated and bold team. According to RMC Sport, Vitinha (25) will not start the match. Fabian Ruiz, 29, and Joao Neves (21) are expected to return to the starting 11. Chevalier – Hakimi, Zabarnyi, Pacho, Mendes – Neves, Zaire-Emery, […]

arts.ttl: Barcelona defender on PSG’s radar for free transfer next summer
arts.sum: Barcelona could soon face an important decision regarding Eric Garcia’s future, as Paris Saint-Germain have been keeping a close eye on the defender’s situation. According to SPORT, the French club are ready to act if the player becomes available on a free transfer next summer. Garcia’s current deal with Barcelona runs out at the end […] The post Barcelona defender on PSG’s radar for free transfer next summer appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – The Parisian squad in the Youth League
arts.sum: This Wednesday, the U19 teams of Paris Saint-Germain and FC Barcelona will face off at the Johan Cruyff Stadium at 4 p.m. as part of the second round of the league phase of the 2025-2026 Youth League (the equivalent of the Champions League for this category). Here is the Parisian squad for this match.
